title: Cat Litter | Non-Toxic, Organic & Natural Varities | Only Natural Pet
description: Shop our selection of natural cat litter made from quality ingredients while saving a trip to the store and up to 15% with Auto Delivery.
cleaned_text: Natural Cat Litter Made with natural ingredients and tested for performance, you won't find a better selection of cat litter anywhere else. Showing 6 Items [Next »](/collections/natural-cat-litter?page=2) At Only Natural Pet, we carry a wide selection of natural cat litter from top brands like Only Natural Pet, [Weruva](https://www.onlynaturalpet.com/collections/weruva-for-cats), Feline Fresh, and World's Best. Our non-toxic cat litter is made with safe, all-natural ingredients that won't harm your kitty or the environment. You can feel good about using non-toxic kitty litter that's formulated with your cat's health and well-being in mind. Choose from clumping grass seed litter, natural pine cat litter, walnut shell cat litter, and more. The materials used in our natural cat litter are tested for performance, safety, and environmental friendliness. Shop today and find the perfect litter for your feline friend! Whether you're searching for the [healthiest cat litter](https://www.onlynaturalpet.com/blogs/holistic-healthcare-library/choosing-the-best-natural-cat-litter), or want to [raise a healthy kitten](https://www.onlynaturalpet.com/blogs/holistic-healthcare-library/preparing-for-a-new-companion), you can find all of your natural cat litter needs at Only Natural Pet.
